name: Home Invasion (burning_shade)
description:
Take Out The Intruders Invading Your Home!

Home Invasion, Is A High score based arcade/strategy game. When 6 invaders enter your abode, you have no choice but too defend your home! Stealthy take out the intruders using a mixture of vampire abilities, such as distractions and going ghost!

This game was made in 2 days for the Mini Jam 118: Vampire. I didn't have much time due to life stuff, so limitation is sorta scuffed; quite happy what I achieved in the small amount of time
